id: Erection of rear/side infill extension, single-storey rear extension in place of the existing conservatory, conversion of garage into habitable rooms, and all associated works.
Erection of a single storey rear extension which projects out from the rear wall of the original house by 6 metres, with an eaves height of 3 metres and a maximum roof height of 3 metres.
001 Sycamore tree- Re-Pollard back to previous cuts (TPO 01, 1967)
addr: Inn Keeping 2A Nicola Close South Croydon CR2 6NB

id: T1: 1 x beech (front garden): Fell T3: 1 x copper beech (rear garden):Crown lift to give 5m clearance above ground level, by shortening the ends of drooping branches only. (TPO 14, 2008)
